document_data.name: Variath
document_data.mainbody: '''Variath''' was a powerful [[druid]] in the [[Chondalwood]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Variath governed a section of Chondalwood.
document_data.History:
Variath was born and raised in the Chondalwood, only venturing into the outside world once.

In 1358 DR, Variath found ten members of the [[Sailors of the Crimson Sea]] mercenary company inside his forest after they had killed a [[deer]], a terrible crime in Variath's eyes. He captured them and put them on trial.
document_data.Personality: Variath believed that all outside the Chondalwood was evil and that men were evil. He hated what he had seen in [[Faer√ªn]]. In truth, Variath was full of petty hatred and wanted to vent his ire on someone.
